channel.title: Coding a home
channel.description: i am coding a new home can someone give me some coordinates on a cool home?

item.title: Coding a home
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

there are many places for home areas, i suggest finding something that hasn’t been used yet. There should be a notepad document in your server files with loads of coords in.

if not i’ll attach a list of coordinates to this post.

Read full topic

item.title: Coding a home
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Your Master, post:4, topic:272704”][quote author=XXwolfXX link=topic=359978.msg2743864#msg2743864 date=1239518258]
i am coding a new home can someone give me some coordinates on a cool home?
[/quote]Just go to a place that you want as your home. Then do ::coords & ::mypos. When you did it will do: Y **** X **** now go to client.java & player.java and find the old coords, change them to the coords now our method > save>compile and restart server, and boom you got your new home.[/quote]
He was asking for specific coordinates for an area.

Read full topic

item.title: Coding a home
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

[quote=“XXwolfXX, post:1, topic:272704”]i am coding a new home can someone give me some coordinates on a cool home?[/quote]Just go to a place that you want as your home. Then do ::coords & ::mypos. When you did it will do: Y **** X **** now go to client.java & player.java and find the old coords, change them to the coords now our method > save>compile and restart server, and boom you got your new home.

Read full topic
